params.en:
[ApRow form_id="form_23034374193637865" class="row gr-page-faq " bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_5567682051652506" xl="12" lg="12" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_8714804697214589" class="faq-title" accordion_type="full" override_folder="" active="1" title="" sub_title="" content_html="

Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to demo@demo.com

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_6411602188934312" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6133225609352409" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="

PrestaShop is a free shopping cart platform that helps small to large businesses build and run a successful online store.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_7242742487037473" accordion_type="accordion" title="How much does PrestaShop cost?" content_html="

PrestaShop is 100% free. No monthly fees. No commissions on your sales.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_4890289892559843" accordion_type="accordion" title="Why is PrestaShop free?" content_html="

We believe everyone should have the ability to start to sell online for free. By forming partnerships with industry leaders (such as Google, PayPal, eBay, etc.), we are able to share our powerful ecommerce software with the world, for free. These strategic partnerships empower our users with rich features and financially support the progress and growth of PrestaShop.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_4125073941222214" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I’m already using another shopping cart, how can I switch to PrestaShop?" content_html="

No matter what ecommerce software you’re using, we’ve made it easy to migrate your store to PrestaShop. Find out how to switch to PrestaShop quickly and seamlessly without losing your store data.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9559978546192276" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I need professional support." content_html="

We have experts waiting to help. Sign up for a technical support plan.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_12390453930784095" accordion_type="accordion" title="What is PrestaShop Download?" content_html="

PrestaShop Download gives you access to our open source code. You can build and self-host your shop and edit all of the files.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
params.fr:
[ApRow form_id="form_23034374193637865" class="row gr-page-faq " bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_5567682051652506" xl="12" lg="12" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_8714804697214589" class="faq-title" accordion_type="full" override_folder="" active="1" title="" sub_title="" content_html="

Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to demo@demo.com

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_6411602188934312" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_6133225609352409" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="

PrestaShop is a free shopping cart platform that helps small to large businesses build and run a successful online store.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_7242742487037473" accordion_type="accordion" title="How much does PrestaShop cost?" content_html="

PrestaShop is 100% free. No monthly fees. No commissions on your sales.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_4890289892559843" accordion_type="accordion" title="Why is PrestaShop free?" content_html="

We believe everyone should have the ability to start to sell online for free. By forming partnerships with industry leaders (such as Google, PayPal, eBay, etc.), we are able to share our powerful ecommerce software with the world, for free. These strategic partnerships empower our users with rich features and financially support the progress and growth of PrestaShop.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_4125073941222214" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I’m already using another shopping cart, how can I switch to PrestaShop?" content_html="

No matter what ecommerce software you’re using, we’ve made it easy to migrate your store to PrestaShop. Find out how to switch to PrestaShop quickly and seamlessly without losing your store data.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9559978546192276" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I need professional support." content_html="

We have experts waiting to help. Sign up for a technical support plan.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_12390453930784095" accordion_type="accordion" title="What is PrestaShop Download?" content_html="

PrestaShop Download gives you access to our open source code. You can build and self-host your shop and edit all of the files.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
